name: Udaipur
description: Udaipur, also known as the 'City of Lakes', is a beautiful city in Rajasthan, India.  It is renowned for its stunning palaces, serene lakes, and vibrant culture.
historicalSignificance: Founded in 1559 by Maharana Udai Singh II as the new capital of the Mewar kingdom.
accessibility: Wheelchair accessible in many areas, but some historical sites may have limitations.
travelTips: Carry light clothing and sunscreen. Book accommodations in advance, especially during peak season.
safetyInfo: Generally safe for tourists.  Be mindful of your belongings and surroundings.
photographersTips: Golden hour provides excellent lighting for capturing the beauty of the lakes and palaces.
